title: United States Department of State - Wikipedia
snippet: The department is headquartered in the Harry S Truman Building, a few blocks from the White House, in the Foggy Bottom neighborhood of Washington, D.C.; "Foggy Bottom" is thus sometimes used as a metonym. Established in 1789 as the first administrative arm of the U.S. executive branch, the ...

title: Harry S Truman Building - Wikipedia
snippet: The Harry S Truman Building is the headquarters of the United States Department of State.

title: U.S. Department of State (DOS) | USAGov
snippet: The Department of State (DOS) advises the President and leads the nation in foreign policy issues. The State Department negotiates treaties and agreements with foreign entities and represents the United States at the United Nations.
